special_text:
[i](As this Saga enters and after your draw step, add a lore counter. Sacrifice after III.)[/i]
I – Exile target creature you control until The Gothorn Project leaves the battlefield.
II – Creatures your opponents control get -1/-1 and lose all abilities until your next turn.
III – When a creature you control enters this turn, put a trample counter and two +1/+1 counters on it.
